com.googlecode.aluminumproject.configuration

Class ConfigurationParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.configuration.ConfigurationParameters

  • public class ConfigurationParameters
extends Object
    Initialisation parameters of a configuration.

    Parameters can be added and retrieved by name. Please note that all parameter values are trimmed and can't be empty or null.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigurationParameters()
      Creates empty configuration parameters.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigurationParameters

        public ConfigurationParameters()
        Creates empty configuration parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • addParameter

        public void addParameter(String name,
                String value)
                  throws AluminumException
        Adds a parameter.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the parameter
        value - the value to set
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when value is null or empty

      • getValue

        public String getValue(String name,
              String defaultValue)
        Finds a parameter value.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the parameter to retrieve the value of
        defaultValue - the value to return if no configuration parameter with the given name was set
        Returns:
        the value of the parameter with the given name

      • getValues

        public String[] getValues(String name,
                 String... defaultValues)
        Finds parameter values. Values are found by retrieving a parameter value and splitting it around commas.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the parameter to retrieve the values of
        defaultValues - the values to return if no configuration parameter with the given name was added
        Returns:
        the values of the parameter with the given name

      • getValueMap

        public Map<String,String> getValueMap(String name,
                             Map<String,String> defaultValueMap)
                               throws AluminumException
        Finds a map of parameter values. Value maps are found by retrieving a parameter value and splitting it around commas and colons.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the parameter to retrieve the value map of
        defaultValueMap - the value map to return if no configuration parameter exists with the given name
        Returns:
        the value map of the parameter with the given name
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the parameter value can't be parsed into a map
